title: Tikka Mac Before It Was Cool
description:
Referenced in this episode:

  • The Creamiest Mac & Cheese (No Roux Required) (Food52)
  • Tikka Masala Mac & Cheese recipe

Genius-Hunter Extra-Credit:

  • More about Preeti's migration from table to farm (Eater)
  • Stay abreast of Preeti's very cool projects

Special thanks to listeners Anita (@anitasyogurt) and Dominique (@dominiqueevanz) for sharing the works of Jonell Nash and Noreen Wasti.
author: podcasts@food52.com (Preeti Mistry, Kristen Miglore)

itunes:title: Tikka Mac Before It Was Cool
itunes:author: Preeti Mistry, Kristen Miglore
itunes:summary: Chef, author, and speaker Preeti Mistry joins Kristen to talk tikka mac & cheese, Waffles & Mochi (!), table to farm, and giving credit where credit's due.
